sentences.en: A pyramid built by the mysterious Maya looms against sunburst clouds in Chichen Itzá, a postclassic site of the lost civilization on the Yucatán Peninsula.
sentences.cn: 尤卡坦半岛失去的文明古遗址奇琴伊察，一座由神秘玛雅人建造的金字塔隐现在破云而出的阳光下。
扉页上是一轮灿烂的旭日.

sentences.en: The totem of this clan is a blood - red face grinning out of a sunburst.
sentences.cn: 邪日氏族的图腾是一张坏笑着向四周迸射日炎的血红色圆脸.

trans.tran_cn: 从云隙射下的阳光，镶有钻石的旭日形首饰
